data.name: Ethereal Summit New York 2020
data.description: Ethereal Summit returns to New York on May 8-9, 2020. Discover what’s next in tech, blockchain, and decentralization.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: Stir Trek
relatedRecords.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.

data.name: General

relatedRecords.name: Girls In Tech Summit
relatedRecords.description: The Girls in Tech Summit is a celebration of TechGirlz’s 10th Anniversary with talks on technology given by girls, for girls. TechGirlz was founded in 2010 and offers free, fun, interactive “TechShopz” led by industry professionals, leaders and students. The TechGirlz mission is to inspire middl

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference
relatedRecords.description: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference is a polyglot event, designed to bring together programmers from the region, regardless of their choice of platform, for two full days of learning from each other and building a stronger regional community.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: #PerfMatters Conference
relatedRecords.description: A two-day community Web Performance conference happening March 31 & April 1, 2020 in Redwood City, CA. Workhops on March 30, 2020 to help get people up to speed on Web Performance. Hackathon on April 2, 2020 to improve online performance documentation.
